QuestData.Title: The Emperor
QuestData.Description: We have everything we need. It's time to start brewing.$b$bPay attention, $n... you might learn a thing or two.
QuestData.LogDescription: Stand by and help Chen Stormstout with his brew.
QuestData.CompletionText: It takes more than three seconds to make beer, $n. Even when your name is Chen Stormstout.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for waiting so long. You are as patient as you are brave.
